explanation: [0-0] In the sky, there is an object emitting yellow gas. On the street below, many people are running, and several are looking up at the sky. The distant background shows mountains covered with lush trees and houses.

[0-10] The object in the sky gradually descends, trailing a long yellow tail. People on the ground continue to run, some looking back at the falling object. Finally, the object falls behind a distant house, and the running crowd stops and stares at the spot where it fell.
